name: Exmouth View Hotel
description: This project was about recreating a website that would be used to provide guests with a comfortable way to access relevant information about their stay. Based on the website of a demolished hotel in 2016, the Exmouth View Hotel, served as the main project for classes CWEB-195 and CWEB-280.
